reviewText: I love the Four Tops, I have miost of their albums.  I recall during the DIsco Era in the 70's these guyswere still hot to play and mix in on the dance floor.  In fact when I couldn't get the floor up dancingin smaller places, nothing got them up like playing the hits of the Four Tops, Diana Ross, and manyother staples of that era.  why the Motown era fit so well in to the Disco era, I can only suspect thattheir music was know by most all, (it is still played at weddings all the time), and it was great "get upsing and dance" music.It clearly looks like the video from the DVD was taken from fairly low quality tape, and I meanwhat one would expect from converting a VCR tape RAW to a DVD sadly.  It is difficult to watchcompared to the quality of the video of groups performing at that time.  Looks OK on a notebookdisplay, but on my 52" Hi-Def Plasma, it was difficult to watch.  I believe that is because myexpectations are higher as many releases are being cleaned up using more advanced videotechnology, and even original tapes are being re-mastered to 5.1.  sadly this looks like it wasslapped together without the advantages of any of the new processing.  I would gladly pay3X dollar value if they cleaned it up.I saw people talking about the sound,and that was not the sticking point for me.This was like watching a well worn VCR tape with dirty heads.  I hope, as a fan, the producersreconsider, but alas I am sure it boiled down to $$$ :(
summary: I love the four tops!  They were a major part of the MoTown scene
Title: N/A

reviewText: There can only ever be ONE - TRUE - FOUR TOPS and this is LEVI - LAWRENCE - DUKE & OBIE - 2004 is their 50th Anniversary together sadly Lawrence left just after this was recorded. LEVI STUBBS JR is at his Best with the opener MCARTHUR PARK and my all time favourite track ASK THE LONELY!Okay they may not be quite the same as in the 60's when they signed with MOTOWN or 1954 when they first formed as THE FOUR TOPS - but they still sound so good! and true performers.Currently LEVI is not performing with the Group, so this keeps us going with the MEMORIES - that NO ONE can ever take away.THE ONE AND ONLY TRUE - FOUR TOPSThanks Guys! - John
summary: THE ONE AND ONLY FOUR TOPS!

reviewText: i have watched this dvd a lot.these guys were such a unique group of all times and you could see in this that although age and poor health was agaist their will,still their perfomance was so great.to all those people who are complaining about this show i suggest you go to Ebay and find out if they still got TEMPS&TOPS or all the SOULTRAIN VOLUMES FROM 1 TO 20 and there you will catch the FOUR TOPS at their best.otherwise they have tried their best in this dvd and is watchable quality.
summary: they were such a unique group
Title: N/A

reviewText: Well first of all let me say that I am a big Motown fan.  In fact, I love classic music period, and I have been collecting music for many years, including video performaces of some of the greatest soul, jazz and classic R&B (not rap crap) artists avaialable.  Unfortunately, not many good video performaces are available of these artists, and most are of very poor picture and sound quality because the producers don't make any effort at restoration.  They just copy some old VCR footage onto a disc and sell it.  In the case of the Four Tops, the picture and sound is relative very good however the concert sadly is not their best performace.  Levi Stubbs demostrates extremely poor stage presence in relating to the audience, and although the group does perform many of their best hits, they also waste time performing the songs of other artists, which is not what the audience (or buyers) paid for. When fans go to a concert of their favorite artists or buy a video, they want to here the material of that particular artist for their money.  In this case the tops perform songs that are light years from their style of music...I mean, the Rolling Stones???...Come on...how far out can you get??  I actually like some Rolling Stones music..but not by the Four Tops!  So, although people who love the Tops will be glad to find any video concert of them with the orignal members...this one is not their best effort by any means.  If you are despreate for some Four Tops video, then buy it...you will probably enjoy hearing the orginal members perform, but if you are expecting a great show you will likely be dissppointed.
Title: N/A

reviewText: this is all four original FOUR TOPS : LEVI, LAWRENCE , DUKE , AND OBIE . You must understand,this performance was recorded in 1996 - actually OVER 40 years after they'd formed , and this is the last filmed performance with LAWRENCE , filmed only MONTHS before his death... and he was probably very much aware he had only a short time left....yet , DESPITE THAT ,AND THEIR ADVANCED AGE, the TOPS  still came out and did a performance that simply SMOKED AND PUT TO SHAME PERFORMANCES BY GROUPS HALF THEIR AGE!!!! TODAYS GROUPS WISHED THEY COULD BE HALF AS GOOD...AND I DARE ANY OF THEM TO BE ABLE TO LAST HALF AS LONG !!!
summary: YOU STILL CAN'T TOUCH THE TOPS !!!
